run_Scheduling_Case_Study_example.py

1 import shutil
2 import os
3 import matplotlib.pyplot as plt
4 
5 # Some variable initialization
6 color_list = ['b','r']
7 markers = ["o", "^"]
8 result_list = [[],[]]
9 
10 # Get a configuration file satisfying the needs of the scheduling study
11 shutil.copyfile("config_Files/config_file_scheduling.ini", "config_file.ini")
12 
13 import configparser
14 import common
15 import DASH_Sim_v0
16 
17 # read the initial configuration file to make modification on the parameters needed for different simulations
18 config = configparser.ConfigParser()
19 config.read('config_file.ini')
20 
21 
22 # Dynamic config parameters
23 scale_list = [600,300,150] # Different injection rates (data points) to run simulations
24 scheduler_list = ['MET','ETF'] # Each of above injection rates will be simulated with different schedulers
25 
26 # Run simulation with each scheduler and each selected scale value (frame or injection rate)
27 for i, scheduler in enumerate(scheduler_list):
28  config['DEFAULT']['scheduler'] = scheduler
29  for rate in scale_list:
30  config['SIMULATION MODE']['scale_values'] = "["+str(rate)+"]"
31  with open('config_file.ini', 'w') as configfile:
32  config.write(configfile)
33  DASH_Sim_v0.run_simulator()
34  # Only average execution time results recored for these simulations
35  ave_exec = common.results.cumulative_exe_time/common.results.completed_jobs
36  injection_rate = common.results.injected_jobs / (common.results.execution_time - common.warmup_period)
37  result_list[i].append((injection_rate, ave_exec))
38 
39 # Plot the results (average execution time)
40 plt.figure(figsize=(5,3))
41 for i, result in enumerate(result_list):
42 
43  plt.plot([x[0] for x in result],[x[1] for x in result],label=scheduler_list[i],color = color_list[i], marker = markers[i])
44 
45 plt.ylim(100,260)
46 plt.yticks(fontsize=12)
47 plt.xticks([0.002,0.004,0.006], [2,4,6],fontsize=12)
48 plt.xlabel('Job Injection Rate (job/ms)', fontsize = 12)
49 plt.ylabel('Avg. Execution Time ($\mu$s)', fontsize = 12)
50 plt.grid()
51 plt.legend()
52 plt.tight_layout()
53 plt.show()
54 
55 # Finally, reset the configuratin file to DEFAULT values
56 shutil.copyfile("./config_Files/config_file.ini", "./config_file.ini")
